alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 12:02AM EDT until September 13 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Harford County in northern Maryland... Southeastern Baltimore County in northern Maryland... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1202 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Middle River, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Middle River, Aberdeen Proving Ground, North Point State Park, Back River, Millers Island, Dundalk, Essex, Rosedale, Rossville, Bowleys Quarters, Perryman, Edgewood, Joppatowne, Edgemere, Fort Howard, Chase, and Martin State Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
